titleStmt.title: The abridgement of the gospell: or The order and course of mans saluation as it is set foorth by Zacharie the father of Iohn Baptist, Luke 1. 67. &c. and further opened in ten sermons thereupon: by Sam. Hieron.
titleStmt.author: Hieron, Samuel, 1576?-1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. Bradwood for Samuel Macham, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Bull-head,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Bull-head
